fields.name: Dissolution Eon - Destroyer of Worlds (C1)
fields.value: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

fields.name: Annihilation Eon - Blossom of Kaleidos (C2)
fields.value: When in party but not the currently active character, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

fields.name: Evil Conqueror - Wrath Deity (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Transcension - Extinction of Suffering (C4)
fields.value: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

fields.name: Evolution Eon - Origin of Ignorance (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Evil Conqueror - Vigilant Yaksha (C6)
fields.value: During Bane of All Evil, hitting 2 or more enemies with a Charged Attack grants Lemniscatic Wind Cycling 1 additional charge and reduces Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's CD by 1s.
